Title: WPF Alphabet
Description: WPF Alphabet is a application that I created to help my child learn the alphabet. It displays each letter and pronounces it using speech synthesis. It was developed using WPF and c# in about 3 hours (so its kinda rough).
HomeWiki:
Project Description
WPF Alphabet is a application that I created to help my child learn the alphabet. It displays each letter and pronounces it using speech synthesis. It was developed using WPF and c# in about 3 hours (so its kinda rough).

Specific WPF Features:
*DispatcherTimer (WPF)
*SpeechSynthesizer (WPF)
*URL Navigate (WPF) not PAGE

XAML Examples:
*DockPanel
*Border
*TextBlock
*HyperLink
*Button's and Events

Author's Homepage at http://michaelcrump.net
